FuncDef: This command allows a CIDR shortest match hit on a route prefix that contains the IP route prefix associated with the route unknown priority event.

ParaDef.Info: When the allow-default parameter is specified with the less-specific command, an RTM return of 0.0.0.0 matches the IP prefix. If less-specific is entered without the allow-default parameter, a return of 0.0.0.0 will not match the IP prefix. To disable allow-default, but continue to allow less-specific match operation, only enter the less-specific command (without the allow-default parameter).

ExtraInfo: Default: no less-specific - The route unknown priority events requires an exact prefix/mask match.
